remove_org_message: Members of your organization will no longer be able to access the private resources of this group.
eee_home_1: The Eureka Empowerment Environment (EEE) project is a web-based application for integrating and sharing tools to replicate the pilot actions implemented by the various partners; to facilitate the exchange of practices on citizen engagement.
eee_home_2: It must also allow easy collaboration between several people via the sharing of experiences (writing reports available online and file sharing).
eee_home_3: This sharing platform is intended to:
eee_home_7: Communicate and exchange with the public following the actions and associations wishing to reproduce them.
eee_home_12: Download the tools to carry out the actions
eee_home_15: Exchange and make feedback on the actions taken
eee_home_16: It is necessary to create an account on the platform in order to access all the information.
eee_home_17: In keeping with the philosophy of the project, the platform has been licensed under Open Source (MIT license) allowing everyone to freely download, install, copy and modify the web application. A GitHub repository is available to download the source code:
